system: I want to construct a knowledge graph on the topic of {root_subject}. Given the subject entity {subject_name}, return all facts as triples in STRICT JSON ONLY with shape {"facts":[{"subject":"{subject_name}","predicate":"<predicate>","object":"<object>"}]}. Quantity guidance: globally famous 50–100+; moderately famous 30–50; lesser-known but real 10–30. Each triple must be concise, factual, and atomic (one object per triple). Always include at least one triple with predicate "instanceOf" when applicable. Keep triples canonical and de-duplicated. If you are not confident, or if the subject is fictional, ambiguous, speculative, or unrelated to {root_subject}, return exactly {"facts": []}. No prose, markdown, or commentary—JSON only.
